medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The current episode of abdominal pain began in the LLQ, 5 days ago. The pain was similar in location and quality to prior diverticulitis. The patient was seen by his PCP 3 days ago with recommendations for outpatient treatment, and the pain began to improve. However, at around 11 am today, the patient began to have general abdominal pain that localized to the RLQ over the course of the day, which was much more severe than his diverticulitis pain and has persisted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulitis, colon polyps, degenerative joint disease (DJD).
